I am sure the entire world shall benefit from this advance in sarcasm.

Thanks for getting me interested in looking up addresses. Ill be up all night now.

It feels strange knowing that my school building is bigger then theres (by school building, I mean the 6 story one that is going to be dropped because of earthquake damage, not the current one, which barely fit half the school).
